verse: स यदि पितृलोककामो भवति संकल्पादेवास्य पितरः समुत्तिष्ठन्ति तेन पितृलोकेन संपन्नो महीयते॥

terms.पितृलोककामः (pitṛloka: kāmaḥ) - desiring the world of ancestors

meaning: Translation:If someone desires the world of ancestors and their wish is fulfilled, their ancestors arise through that world of ancestors, and one becomes endowed with greatness/nobility.
